W

Weaver - Class in akha.yakhont.weaver
The Weaver class weaves the given application's compiled classes according to the configuration file info.
Weaver() - Constructor for class akha.yakhont.weaver.Weaver
Initialises a newly created Weaver object.
WeaverTransform - Class in akha.yakhont.weaver
The WeaverTransform class is just the wrapper for the Weaver one, allowing to use Google's Transform API.
WeaverTransform(boolean, String, String, String[], boolean) - Constructor for class akha.yakhont.weaver.WeaverTransform
Initialises a newly created WeaverTransform object.
